author: Caroline Kelly and Jeremy Herb, CNN
title: Former intelligence community watchdog addresses recent firing
description: The former intelligence community inspector general, who informed Congress of the whistleblower complaint that led to President Donald Trump's impeachment, said Sunday that he believes Trump fired him for doing his job.
